originInfo.publisher: Louisiana. Dept. of Wildlife and Fisheries

mods.abstract: After a skiff is painted and ready to have the engine mounted it is then sunk for at least four days. This will cause the lumber to swell and eliminate any possible leaks.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
